Plot: Four friends embark on a misadventure to a remote lake house where one of them announces that he plans to kill himself.
Title: Steve Chong Finds Out That Suicide Is a Bad Idea
Writer: Owen Hornstein, Charlie LaVoy (story), Tyler Russell (story), Joe Sökmen (story), Stanley Wong (story)
Actors: Stanley Wong, Joe Sökmen, Tyler Russell, Owen Hornstein
